**Masker**
Program that generates HTML files that contain cloaked iFrame sites
## Data URL

To use it, open this link (or download the index.html file):



**How to Host**
<div>
Download the zip and, use any frontend hosting, render, codepen, cloudflare etc etc
and upload the files.
</div>
**Locally**
<div>
Install zip, unzip and open Index.html
</div>
